{s3}: Esta pessoa parece ocupada. Acho que eu não deveria incomodar...
Esta pessoa parece ocupada. Acho que eu não deveria incomodar...
You think you're better than us, huh.{***}
I have never said anything like that...{***}
So you think I'm stronger than you?{***}
I do not like to be mocked.{***}
Well, no. We are equals. So it would not be smart to start a fight in which both of us may lose, right?{***}
Well, you are right about that. I want to lose in a fight no more than you. I hope to see you again.{***}
I certainly am!{***}
I'll wipe that smirk right off your face!{***}
It is an honor to be a part of your fine company of men.{***}
I want to see your skills.{***}
Let me see your equipment.{***}
Yes, your honor.{***}
How else may I serve?{***}
I think we need to part our ways.{***}
Are you sure, your honor?{***}
Yes, I am certain.{***}
No, I'd rather have you at my side.{***}
Thank you.{***}
Quero adiar a nomeação de um novo lorde até que me consulte com meus súditos.
Como desejar, {senhor/milady}. Pode decidir isso mais tarde.
Como quiser, {senhor/senhora}. {reg6?Eu serei:{reg7?Você será:{s11} será}} {reg3?a nova lady:o novo lorde} de {s1}.
{s1} ainda não possui um gerente. A quem devo atribuir esse cargo?
{reg0?{s65}:Por favor, {s65}}, gostaria de receber {s1} como minha propriedade. (feudos: {s0})
{s66}, {s1} deveria pertencer a você. (feudos: {s0})
Você não precisa nomear ninguém no momento, decida depois.
Hmmm. Muito bem, {playername}. Eu valorizo seu conselho. Eu adiarei a nomeação de um lorde para {s1} para um outro momento.
Hmmm. Muito bem, {playername}. Aprecio muito o seu conselho. {reg6?Eu:{reg7?Você:{s11}}} será {reg3?a nova lady:o novo lorde} de {s1}.

Saudações, amigo. Estamos aqui melhorando nossas habilidades de combate com um pouco de prática direta. Parece que um pouco de treinamento também lhe cairia bem. Por que não junta-se a nós? Poderíamos ensinar-lhe alguns truques. E se precisar de alguma explicação sobre qualquer conceito de combate, basta simplesmente perguntar e eu tentarei ajudá-lo com todo meu esforço.
O que deseja praticar?
Diga-me, o que deseja praticar?
Quero praticar o ataque.
Quero praticar o bloqueio com minha arma.
Vamos praticar o combate direto.
[Deixar]

Está bem. Há quatro principais direções para atacar. São elas: na cabeça, direita, esquerda e estocada. Agora, ensinarei em que direção deves atacar para que possa fazer corretamente. ^^(Mova seu mouse enquanto pressiona o botão esquerdo para especificar a direção do ataque. Por exemplo, para executar um ataque do alto, mova o mouse para cima no momento em que o botão esquerdo é pressionado. Os ícones na tela o ajudarão a praticar a ação correta).
Vamos começar então. Estou pronto.
Na verdade, gostaria de tentar outra coisa.

Diferentemente de um escudo, bloqueando com a própria arma você conseguirá deter apenas os ataques procedentes de uma única direção. Por exemplo, se você dirigir o seu olhar para cima, desviará os ataques que vêm do alto, mas ainda poderá ser atingido por um golpe lateral ou por uma estocada. ^^(Pressione e segure o botão direito do mouse para bloquear).

Agora irei atacá-lo com diferentes tipos de golpes e vou esperar até que você bloqueie corretamente antes de atacá-lo. Tente preparar o bloqueio correto, logo que possível. ^^(Esta prática é fácil de fazer com a opção de "bloqueio automático" ativada como padrão. Se for ao menu de "Opções Gerais" você poderá selecionar bloquear a direção manualmente. Isto torna o combate muito mais difícil, porém, mais interessante).
Vamos começar então. Estou pronto.
Na verdade, gostaria de tentar outra coisa.

O combate direto é uma excelente forma de preparação para um combate real. Agora vamos combater uns aos outros com armas não letais, até que um de nós caia no chão. Você poderá concluir a prática com algumas contusões, é claro, mas é melhor do que receber cortes de graves consequências.
Vamos começar então. Estou pronto.
Na verdade, gostaria de tentar outra coisa.

Muito bem! Você conseguiu bloquear meus ataques com sucesso. Você pode repetir esta prática e tentar fazê-la cada vez mais rápido, até que esteja seguro de que suas habilidades de defesa são suficientes. Quer tentar de novo?
Bem, isso não foi muito bom, certo? (Lembre-se, você deve pressionar e segurar o botão direito do mouse para manter um bloqueio efetivo). Gostaria de tentar de novo?
Sim, vamos tentar novamente.
Não, creio que isso já foi o suficiente.
Hey! Estamos fazendo uma prática de bloqueio, companheiro. Supõe-se que você deve bloquear meus ataques, não me atacar.
Desculpe. Dê-me outra oportunidade.
Desculpe, tenho que terminar esta prática agora.
Perfeito. Como quiser.
Bem, isso não foi muito bom, certo? Não se sinta mal por isso, apenas trate de não repetir os mesmos erros da próxima vez. Gostaria de tentar de novo?
Sim. Vamos mais uma rodada.
Não. Isso já foi o suficiente.
Bem, então perfeito. Diga-me novamente, se mudar de ideia.
Ei, isso foi bom. Você me derrotou, mas da próxima vez eu terei mais cuidado. Quer tentar de novo?
Muito bem! Você aprendeu como atacar a partir da direção que você deseja. Se quiser, podemos tentar isso de novo ou partir para um tipo diferente de exercício.

Nada mal. Não está tão mau! Parece que você compreendeu as noções básicas de tiro com arco. Agora, tente fazer o mesmo com uma besta. Pegue a besta e os dardos ali e dispare para esses três alvos. A besta é muito mais fácil de disparar que o arco, porém é necessário que você a recarregue-a depois de cada disparo.
Bom. A besta não foi tão difícil. Em seguida, você aprenderá a utilizar as armas de arremesso. Reúna as lanças que você encontrar e tente acertá-las nesses três alvos.

Bem, você tem praticado as habilidades básicas para usar três tipos de armas de longo alcance. O resto aprenderá com a prática. Treinando todos os dias, com o tempo você se tornará tão bom quanto os melhores atiradores de Calradia.
Agora, você pode falar com os guerreiros ou com o instrutor de montaria, se você ainda não tiver feito isso. Eles podem lhe ensinar importantes habilidades.

Bom dia, meu jovem. Passo meus dias ensinando tudo o que sei sobre armas de longo alcance a qualquer pessoa que esteja disposta a aprender. Você precisa de um treinador? Eu poderia lhe ensinar como usar o arco, a besta e as lanças de longo alcance.
Sim, me ensine a usar as armas de longo alcance.
Não, agora não.

Está bem. Seu primeiro treinamento será o tiro com arco. O arco é uma arma difícil de dominar. Porém, uma vez que você seja suficientemente hábil com ele, poderá disparar com rapidez e precisão. Vá buscar o arco e as flechas que você vê ali e atire nos alvos.
Certo. Estou pronto.
Desculpe. Tenho que fazer uma coisa primeiro.
Espero que tenha gostado do passeio. Agora passemos para a algo um pouco mais difícil. Pegue a lança que você vê ali e, cavalgando seguindo o curso de cada alvo, golpeie-os pelo menos uma vez.

Muito bem! Você conseguiu atingir todos os alvos a cavalo. Isso não é tarefa fácil para um iniciante. Seu próximo desafio será usar um arco e flecha para atirar nos alvos que encontrar pelo caminho. Você terá que apontar para cada alvo.
Muito bom. Você foi capaz de atirar em todos os alvos do lombo de um cavalo. Cavalgue e pratique essas coisas todos os dias. Se fizer isso, ao longo do tempo você se tornará um perito cavaleiro.
Agora você pode ir falar com os guerreiros ou com o treinador arqueiro, caso não o tenha feito ainda. Você deve aprender tudo o que puder para estar preparado quando precisar se defender.

Saudações, irmão! Eu vim aqui obter uma prática de montaria, mas meus velhos músculos doem tanto que decidi fazer uma pausa por hoje. Você quer praticar sua montaria? Se quiser, pode montar o meu cavalo. O exercício lhe fará bem.
Sim, gostaria de praticar a montaria.
Uhm. Talvez mais tarde.

Ótimo. Agora mostrarei alguns exercícios para ensinar-lhe a montar e usar armas enquanto estiver a cavalo. Sua primeira tarefa é simples. Apenas monte em seu cavalo e cavalgue ao redor do campo. Pode ir lentamente ou rápido, como você desejar. Volte apenas quando se sentir seguro como um cavalgador, para que eu possa lhe propor algumas tarefas mais complexas.
Certo. Estou pronto.
Um minuto, tenho que fazer algo antes.
Ei, estou tentando praticar aqui. Vá falar com o arqueiro instrutor se precisar de ajuda com armas de longo alcance.
Há uma mudança de plano?
O que está acontecendo?
I can speak your tongue. What is your business here?{***}
I am nothing but a merchant, sir.{***}
Merchant you say? I take it your wares were on that ship?{***}
Indeed.{***}
Well... There are many bandits, is all I can say. I know not who those ones are. It seems you are safe now, I wish you luck in your travels.{***}
My business? I will be having that armor of yours, or I will take it off your dead body.{***}
You are a fool. Okel Jakkaarii!{***}
Oleth hrakkarikh, lanqoyi rhoa.{***}
Oh where is Angvar? Where is my husband?{***}
He died bravely, Helga.{***}
(leave her to mourn){***}
Where is Torsson?{***}
He died bravely, I am sorry I could not save him.{***}
Where is Torsson? That is a very good question; he couldn't make it on the voyage back, perhaps he is still raiding.{***}
Stop playing games! He is dead, I can see right through you, coward!{***}
And why did you not die with him, like a true kinsman?{***}
He is dead and couragous, you are living and cowardly. Soon you will be dead and cowardly. Draw your spear if you still have any iron in your blood.{***}
You have returned to us in peace, my {reg33?sister:brother}.{***}
Yes, Falmann. It is good to see you.{***}
What news do you bring?{***}
We have slain the bastard Svafar, and are here to redeem ourselves. We hope that you will forgive us for the disgraceful actions we have committed in the past.{***}
I am proud of you, {reg33?sister:brother}. You return to us in peace, and have buried Svafar so Torsson may rest in peace. We will never forget your actions.{***}
Thank you, Falmann. We will be returning to the mainland now, for much remains that I must do.{***}

Hold, {reg33?sister:brother}. I have a gift for you that has belonged to us Hylr for many generations. I present to you this axe. I do not know what its history is, for its story has long been forgotten. Regardless, I am certain you will find it to your liking.{***}
Thank you again, Falmann. May the Gods guide us today to honor and glory.{***}
Ready to leave?{***}
Yes, let me be off.{***}
Not quite yet.{***}
Well, I see Kvensson has a spear in his throat. I cannot blame you for his death, as he challenged you. However, you are one of two survivors to Torsson's raid. Tell me what happened.{***}
Well, a Valahir Aethling attacked us you see... [admit cowardice]{***}
Well, he asked Hyk and I to scout ahead you see, and he wasn't there upon our return... [deny cowardice]{***}
You disgust me.{***}
You do not deserve the very clothes on your back, wrought by better hands than yours.{***}
*spits* But I will give you another chance. Do not act such a coward again, or you will find me less lenient.{***}
You say you found a bit of cloth with Aethling Svafar's sigil on it when looking at your camp? I have no doubt that it is his doing.{***}

You must avenge Torsson's death, as the survivor and friend to him. Talk to me when you are ready to sail back to Perisno. I know you may not have the capacity to beat him now, but you have all the time in the world. Svafar's death is your mission.{***}
Thank you for giving me this chance to prove myself. I will not fail in this.{***}
Good day, I am a merchant from south, looking to sell a few of my wares. What can I do for you?{***}
I want to trade. Show me your wares.{***}
Ah, yes. Take a look.{***}
Anything else?{***}
Tell me. What are people talking about these days?{***}

Well, nothing new lately. Prices, weather, the wars; the same old things. I know little of what men are talking of here on Hylr, I am simply a merchant trying to find my way to as many remote places as possible to sell my wares and hopefully, find some interesting stories. You could say I'm a bit of an adventurer myself!{***}
Good-bye.{***}
Peço humildemente que {o senhor/a senhora} mantenha as mãos onde eu possa vê-las.
O que você está olhando?
Está olhando para mim?
Que desperdício...
Antes ele do que eu.
Não sei dizer... Algum animal, sem dúvida.
Com licença, por favor aceite minhas desculpas.
Eu irei deixar passar... dessa vez.  Agora cai fora.
Vou tirar esse sorriso do seu rosto!
Vou tirar esse sorriso do seu rosto!
Você tem alguma ideia de quem eu sou?
Deveria me importar?
Grande conversa para um pequeno verme. Vou colocá-lo em seu lugar!
Hummm... Na verdade... Sim, sim, eu sei quem você é, {s0}. Por favor, perdoe-me vossa Graça... deve ser o álcool. Vou indo, agora...
Se é luta que você quer, é luta que você terá!
Como eu imaginava. Agora retire-se daqui!
Certamente você parece {um camarada/uma dama} capaz de dar um bom par de golpes. Tenho uma proposta para você.
Como assim?
Bom. Alegro-me em ver que está interessado. O plano é o seguinte... É um pouco complicado, então ouça-me atentamente.

Você e outra pessoa começarão uma briga aqui. Sem armas, nem armadura... Eu me sentarei aqui e receberei apostas, para depois dividir os lucros com o vencedor. Se perdermos, vou cobrir os custos. Você não tem nada a perder... exceto um pouco de sangue, é claro.

No entanto, é impossível organizar isso como um daqueles belos confrontos na arena, onde todas as apostas são feitas com antecedência. Pessoas a pé, atraídas pelo barulho, apostarão alguns denares em quem acreditarem que irá ganhar. Estou convencido de que temos muito a ganhar com isso.

Bem, como pode ver, o truque é prolongar a luta o maior tempo possível, de modo que todos pensem que você irá perder. As pessoas vão se colocar contra você e você inverterá o destino da luta no último momento. Para você, a melhor maneira de fazer dinheiro é deixar-se ser espancado até quase o nocaute, em seguida, levantar-se e vencer. Você deve virar o jogo no fim da luta, caso contrário, nem eu, nem você, ganharemos o dinheiro.

Por outro lado, você não pode arrastar a luta por muito tempo, porque assim as pessoas vão começar a suspeitar do truque. Por isso, ambos terão que receber alguns golpes de vez em quando. Não me importa quanto sangue seja derramado, mas os espectadores precisam ver sangue.
E outra coisa... O meu colega, com quem você vai lutar, não é muito inteligente. Ele partirá diretamente para você, portanto será de sua responsabilidade introduzir criatividade no combate.
E então, o que me diz?
{!}[Yes -- not yet implemented]{***}
Tenho coisas melhores para fazer.
Que tenha um bom dia, {meu jovem/minha jovem}.
Perdoe-me, você parece ser um mercador, mas não consigo ver suas mercadorias.
Não me importa.
Mercador? Oh, sim, sou um mercador. Meus bens são um pouco diferentes do tradicional. Devem ser alimentados e hidratados duas vezes ao dia, e quando eu me viro, tentam escapar.
Gado?

Não exatamente. Costumo dizer a mim mesmo que sou o homem responsável por manter todos os navios do oceano navegando. Veja só, os navios são movidos por remos e os remos necessitam de homens que os manejem, caso contrário eles param. É aí que eu entro.
Galeotes.

Vejo que você está compreendendo! Um porto comercial como este não poderia sobreviver sem eles. Os navios perdem vários pares de braços em cada viagem, por isso há sempre uma grande demanda. Os capitães vêm a mim, e pagam muito bem.
De onde vem os escravos?

A maior parte deles são criminosos condenados que eu compro das autoridades. Outros são prisioneiros de guerra de diferentes nações, trazidos a mim porque eu sempre ofereço os melhores preços. No entanto, de vez em quando também compro indivíduos de outras... "fontes". Não se pode ser muito exigente com seus fornecedores neste negócio. Você por acaso não teria algum prisioneiro aí com você?
Eu?

Por que não? Se pretende colocar os pés fora desta cidade, mais cedo ou mais tarde acabará cruzando espadas com alguém. E se o Céu quiser, sairá vitorioso do encontro. Por que não fazer um dinheiro extra? Se você mantê-los vivos e trazê-los para mim, pagarei 50 denares por cabeça. Não me importa quem são, nem de onde vêm.
Hmm... Pensarei sobre isso.
Pense nisso! Há uma grande quantidade de ouro a ser feito, não se deixe enganar. O suficiente para nós dois.
Olá, {playername}.
Algo mais?
Eu trouxe alguns prisioneiros, Ramun. Gostaria de dar uma olhada?
Eu quero vender todos os escravos que eu tenho comigo.
Tomarei todos os seus {reg0} {reg2?prisioneiros:prisioneiro} das suas mãos por {reg1} denares. Temos um acordo?
Sim, temos um acordo.
Deixe-me pensar sobre isso novamente.
Deixe-me ver o que você tem...
Foi um prazer fazer negócio com você.
Como faço para capturar um prisioneiro?
Pode contar-me novamente como capturar prisioneiros?

Você é iniciante nesta prática, não é? Deixe-me explicar em termos simples. A regra básica para capturar um prisioneiro é nocauteá-lo com uma arma contundente, como uma maça ou uma clava de madeira, em vez de furá-lo com uma espada. Desta forma, ele perderá a consciência por um curto período de tempo em vez de sangrar até a morte, sabe? Eu suponho que você tenha uma arma dessas com você, tem?
Claro.
Bem, na verdade eu não tenho.

Bom. Nesse caso, tudo o que precisa fazer é bater no idiota com sua arma e colocá-lo a ferros depois da luta. É um pouco diferente para os nobres e semelhantes, pois eles costumam estar suficientemente protegidos de modo que o tipo de arma utilizada torna-se irrelevante. Mesmo assim, podem sangrar como porcos se você golpeá-los com algo afiado. Eu não sou muito exigente quanto a minha mercadoria, mas insisto que eles devem estar vivos quando eu comprá-los.

Não? Ah, bem, esse deve ser o seu dia de sorte. Tenho aqui uma velha clava de madeira que iria jogar fora. Está um pouco gasto, mas acho que ainda serve para esmagar alguém até que pare de se mover. Tome, pode levá-lo.
Obrigad{o/a}, Ramun. Irei experimentá-lo em breve.

Muito bem, tentarei explicar novamente em termos simples. A regra básica para capturar um prisioneiro é nocauteá-lo com uma arma contundente, como uma maça ou uma clava de madeira, em vez de furá-lo com uma espada. Desta forma, ele perderá a consciência por um curto período de tempo, em vez de sangrar até a morte. Para os nobres e semelhantes é um pouco diferente, pois eles costumam ser suficientemente protegidos de modo que o tipo de arma utilizada torna-se irrelevante. Mesmo assim, podem sangrar como porcos se você golpeá-los com uma arma afiada.
Certo, creio que entendi. Algo mais?

Bem, não é tão simples como parece. As armas contundentes não são tão danosas como as armas afiadas, desta forma lhe custará mais para derrotar seus inimigos. E acredite em mim, se você dar-lhes uma escolha, a maioria dos vermes que encontrar preferirá matá-l{o/a} do que capturá-l{o/a}. Então não espere cortesia quando sacar um clube no lugar de uma espada. Além disso, ter que arrastar os prisioneiros em torno de seu grupo o deixará mais lento, razão pela qual alguns preferem simplesmente libertar seus prisioneiros depois de uma batalha. Isso é loucura! Como alguém pode rejeitar todo esse dinheiro, hã?
Isso é tudo?

Ah, sim, uma última coisa. Lidar corretamente com prisioneiros não é fácil, pode-se dizer que é um tipo específico de habilidade. Se você deseja capturar muitos prisioneiros, deve tentar aprender os truques por conta própria... caso contrário, não conseguirá manter um só homem que pegar.
Obrigado, tentarei me lembrar.
É melhor eu ir.
Lembre-se, você pode me trazer qualquer prisioneiro que capturar. Pagarei uma boa quantia por cada um.
Do you have any tasks for me?{***}

Why, of course! Business lately has been absolutely terrible! It seems like people like to kill other people more than to take them prisoner! It is absolutely horrible. Why kill someone with a sword when you can knock them out with blunt weapons and sell them as nice slaves?{***}
Why, indeed!{***}
Since business is so terrible right now, I am hoping you can capture some prisoners for me. Any prisoner is fine. I will reward you well.{***}
Alright! I'll do it. {***}
No thanks. Maybe another time, Ramun.{***}
Excellent! Remember, you need 15 prisoners of any kind.{***}
I have the prisoners!{***}
Excellent! Here is the reward I promised you.{***}
Foi uma honra servi-l{o/a}, {senhor/minha senhora}
You should never see this. If you do, PM 'Something Unusual' on Taleworlds forum.{***}
What do you wish to know, {reg33?my Lady:Sire}?{***}
What do you know of the lords of the other kingdoms?{***}
Where are the monarchs of the other kingdoms, currently?{***}
Where would you recommend I send my armies next?{***}
I want to target an enemy lord.{***}
Never mind.{***}
I will be available when needed, {reg33?my Lady:Sire}.{***}
My men tell me that the following lords could be turned...^{s4}{***}
My men tell me that the following lords could be turned...^{s4}{***}
Thank you, you have been most helpful.{***}
Thank you.{***}

{reg33?Madam:Sir}, it is not unusual for the great and good of this land to be targeted by assassins  and the like - you yourself have had a scare or two. As Spymaster, I am in a position to offer you the  same service. ^^ Be aware that this type of action, though covert, could affect your reputation if it is discovered  that you have had anything to do with it. Would you like to hear your options?{***}
Tell me what my options are.{***}
I have no enemies I would wish this upon.{***}

Very well, {reg33?Madam:Sir}. You can go about targeting an enemy lord in two ways. ^^ First, you can sponsor an attack on a lord by hiring a mercenary company. There is one in town  right now that would prove suitable. This group would hunt down and attack your chosen lord, and they will  pursue him to the ends of the earth. For example, if he  is defeated by another, they will lie in wait until he regroups and attack again. Note that the lord needs to be in transit between centres before our troops can attack.  The ususal fee for this service is in the region of ten thousand aurums.{***}

Second, you can hire assassins to target that lord when he is away from his retinue.  These men can be relied upon for their secrecy, though past attempts have shown that there  is a high chance that the lord will fight them off. However, attacks which do succeed  cause a lot of damage to a lord and his reputation. The target lord needs to own at least one fief, as that makes  it easy for the assassins to lie in wait.^^ This service does not come cheap; the assassins usually command a fee of fifteen thousand aurums.{***}
I'd like to target an enemy lord and his army.{***}
I'd like to order an assassination.{***}
I've changed my mind. This skulduggery is not for me.{***}

By the way, it would be very foolish to target a king in this way, as you would lose the  goodwill of both the people and the gentry if discovered, so I do not offer you that option.^^ The following lords all hold some enmity towards you. Which one would you like to target?{***}
Never mind.{***}
I'm afraid the Kingdom does not have enough money to sponsor an attack.{***}

Very well. The Mercenaries are outside, preparing for their journey. My {reg33?lady:lord}, if  you decide to follow them, please do so at a discreet distance.  It would not do to have your name associated with this attack.{***}

By the way, it would be very foolish to target a king in this way, as you would lose the  goodwill of both the people and the gentry if discovered, so I do not offer you that option.^^ The following lords all hold some emnity towards you. Which one would you like to assassinate?{***}
Never mind.{***}
I'm afraid the Kingdom does not have enough money to sponsor an attack.{***}

Very well. I will pass on your instructions to the right people.  Remember, my {reg33?Lady:Lord}, the success of this attack is not guaranteed.^^ Go now, and I will send you word as to our success or failure.{***}

My {reg33?Queen:King}, I am your humble servant in charge of war in this kingdom. I wish to make myself of use. If you need anything war related, just consult me and I will help you in any way possible.{***}
Thank you. I'm sure you will be of much use to me now and in the future.{***}
You have need of me, my {reg33?Queen:King}?{***}
I would like to hire a small Perisnoan army to help keep order.{***}
I would like to hire some mercenaries.{***}

Never mind. (Not enough money or one is already in the field).{***}

Never mind.{***}
I will send the orders immediately. Is there anything else you need?{***}
Very well. About whom do you wish to hear?{***}
I have a different request.{***}
My reports indicate that of the {reg26} patrols your kingdom can support, there are {reg25} currently active.{***}
Thank you.{***}
Hail, traveler.{***}
Greetings, my lord Torlan.{***}
Death to you and your Tolranian allies!{***}
I do not fear death. I will fight for the Kingdom.{***}
You will not live to see another dawn!{***}
State your business. You are traveling through the lands of the Drachen.{***}
I am just traveling by.{***}
My business? My business is none of your concern. Who do you think you are?{***}
How dare you. You will pay for that insult!{***}
Surrender to the Dragon Empire, or die.{***}
Good day, Ghareebian.{***}
Hello. Just passing through.{***}
Ghareebian? Is that some sort of insult? Die!{***}
Stupid westerner ... Ghareebian. You dare attack us?{***}
Vamos sair assim que você estiver pront{o/a}.
Don't do anything you might regret, stranger.{***}
I won't. I am just passing by.{***}
I won't. But you just did. Die!{***}
The Old Gods favor us. We will not lose this fight.{***}
Por favor, não desperdice mais o meu tempo, {senhor/senhora}. Talvez nos encontremos de novo em nossas viagens.
What is it?{***}
Nothing.{***}
Die, you stupid Naphali!{***}
We are under the protection of Queen Arwen. Your foolish act will not be forgotten.{***}
Muito bem, você venceu. Não tenho nada a dizer.
What is it?{***}
Nothing.{***}
You have just declared war against our mighty empire by your foolish action. You will regret it.{***}
Bem, {senhor/senhora}! Por favor, não se incomode tentando levantar-se do solo, já que teria que voltar a cair. Tomarei seu silêncio por uma desculpa. Que tenha um bom dia.
I have heard your name, {playername}! Your audacity is at an end! Surrender or die!{***}
What is it, my {reg33?Lady:Lord}?{***}

Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}

Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}

Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}

Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}

Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}
Surrender or die!{***}

What, {reg33?ma'am:sir}?{***}

Damn you! You will regret your foolish actions!{***}
Don't kill us, we surrender!{***}
Surrender to the justice of the Reich, or die!{***}
Nothing. Farewell.{***}
Damn you! For the Reich and the Kaiser!{***}

Nothing. Farewell.{***}

Nothing. Farewell.{***}
At them, men!{***}
In the name of the Queen, surrender your troops and weapons.{***}
Nothing. Farewell.{***}
Damn you! Charge, Naphali!{***}
In the name of the Emperor Hakkon, lay down your arms!{***}
Nothing. Farewell.{***}
Damn you! At {reg33?her:his} throat, men!{***}
In the name of the Emperor Hakkon, lay down your arms!{***}
Yes, my {reg33?Queen:King}?{***}
Nothing. Keep your eyes open.{***}
We are watching for the enemy, my {reg33?Queen:King}.{***}
I have some new orders for you.{***}
Patrol a new area.{***}
Guard a fief.{***}
Give me your prisoners.{***}

Nothing. Continue with your current orders.{***}
Where?{***}
As you wish.{***}
Never mind.{***}
Where?{***}
As you wish.{***}
Never mind.{***}
Yes, what do you wish, my {reg33?Lady:Lord}?{***}
Nothing. Continue scouting.{***}
My {reg33?Queen:King}, we are at your service!{***}
Just passing through. Continue on your business.{***}
For the Kingdom and the King!{***}
Hail, friend.{***}
Greetings, my lords. I wish you good fortune on your journey.{***}
Death to you and your Tolranian allies!{***}
Death is but an inconvenience for our kind. Yours, however, shall be permanent.{***}
You will not live to see another dawn!{***}
Greetings.{***}
Stranger, welcome to the land of the Reich.{***}
Death to you, Drachen scum!{***}
You seek to harm a Drachen Noble? So be it, fool.{***}
We will fight to the bitter end!{***}
Please, don't attack! We surrender!{***}
We shall destroy you and grind you into the desert sands.{***}
What business have you in the Draharan desert?{***}
I am but a traveller, noble ally.{***}
My business is to destroy you!{***}
We were born in our saddles. You will die in yours.{***}
We are the Chosen of the New Gods. Mal'Kij will decide your fate, now.{***}
Greetings. We are the Steel Knights of the New Gods. What business do you have here, friend?{***}
We are just traveling through.{***}
Your gods are worthless and so is the faction you serve. Die!{***}
So be it. If you surrender now, you will be well treated, however.{***}
We are the Chosen of the Old Gods. Mal'Kiarj will decide your fate, now.{***}
Greetings. We are the Black Knights of the Old Gods. What is it you want here?{***}
So be it. For glory, and victory!{***}
For the Queen!!{***}
Get away, vile creature! You do not deserve to look upon the eyes of a Noble Naphali.{***}
Sorry, friend.{***}
You will die for that, Naphali !{***}
Inferior being. I shall pluck your eyes out with arrows myself!{***}
For the Emperor!!{***}
State your business.{***}
Just passing through. I'll leave you in peace.{***}
You will die for your impertinence!{***}
My brothers! To arms!{***}
Foolish Perisnoan. You are all so weak. The Emperor will not tolerate fools like you. Prepare to die!{***}
You are passing through Zann lands. State your business or get out!{***}
Sorry, friend. I'll be leaving in peace.{***}
This is MY land, fool!{***}
Ha! We will enjoy crushing you!{***}
Halt! I have heard your name, {playername}! Your audacity is at an end! Surrender or die!{***}
State your business.{***}
Nothing. I was merely passing by.{***}
Surrender or die!{***}
By attacking us, you attack the Emperor himself!{***}

We are the elites of Shun-Ha, united by the Zann. You shall be crushed to pieces!{***}
Halt! I have heard your name, {playername}! Your audacity is at an end! Surrender or die!{***}

Patrol a new area.{***}
Guard a fief.{***}

Nothing. Continue with your current orders.{***}

Never mind.{***}

As you wish.{***}
Never mind.{***}
Gladly.{***}

Indeed.{***}

Yes, that would be nice.{***}

Yes, I dare. And I will continue to do so as I please. Now, surrender or die!{***}
We are the Grazir Worshippers, the chosen of Death! Surrender or die!{***}
I'm not afraid of you. I will fight.{***}
We are the Grazir Worshippers, the chosen of Death! It is doom to face us!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}

May the Dreaded One destroy you!{***}
May I destroy the Dreaded One!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
See you around!{***}
Time for the Grazir to become cleansed.{***}
We have been in this world for a long time. The time is near ... when Grazir will rule the world. The Dreaded One shall come.{***}
What nonsense! Prepare to die.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Grazir souls, prepare to die!{***}
We fight for a higher cause. Lesser beings like you must be eradicated in this world.{***}
Your knighthood order is corrupt. I doubt you do anything for a 'higher cause.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Interesting. Well, see you around!{***}
Is that so?  Let's start with your corrupt order, then.{***}
Get out of our way, fool. We will cleanse this land of vermin.{***}
Vermin? I'm looking right at it.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Well, have fun! Good luck with your vermin thing.{***}
Vermin? I'm looking right at it.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Well, have fun! Good luck with your vermin thing.{***}
Vermin? I'm looking right at it.{***}
Muito bem, você venceu. Eu me retrato. Espero que isto {o/a} satisfaça.
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Good luck with your world cleansing!{***}
Your knighthood order is corrupt. I doubt you do anything for a 'higher cause.'{***}
Há! Você não é tão galanteador agora, hã? Não me incomode mais.
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Tempting...but, no.  We'll be leaving now.{***}
It's time for you to be sacrificed to me.{***}

So be it!{***}

Not today. Go in peace.{***}
I accept your challenge!{***}

We will fight you, and the Gods will decide who is the heretic.{***}
No, I don't think so.{***}
Seeing your head on a pike would be good for me right now!{***}
We have survived throughout Perisno's history, and can never be stopped! Zeladeck guides us to victory!{***}

I have something that may interest you.{***}
That's nice. We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Zelaeck is about to guide you to defeat!{***}
We are here to scout a pathway for our Emperor. It's too bad you won't live long enough to see the Zann reign!{***}
The Zann will never reign, so of course I will never live to see it.{***}
We are here to scout a pathway for our Emperor. Soon you shall see the Zann reign!{***}
Charming.  Well, have a nice day.{***}
The Zann may reign, but you will never live to see it.{***}
Foolish wanderer. You dare trespass in our land? It is time for you to die.{***}
Your land? Last I checked, this land belonged to nature.{***}
Foolish wanderer. Do not trespass in our land. Hurry up and leave.{***}
We are just passing through.  No need to fight.{***}
Your land? Last I checked, this land belonged to nature.{***}
We have a dozen archers aiming at every one of you.{***}
Try and hit us, then!{***}
Move any deeper in our forest and we will be forced to fill you with arrows.{***}
No need to be so aggressive. We are leaving.{***}
I'm not waiting for an ambush.  We will fight it out right here!{***}
Well, well, what is this? Another group of foolish adventurers. My fellow Naphali, we shall enjoy this very much.{***}
You aren't getting anything from me!{***}
Well, well, what is this? Another group of foolish adventurers.{***}
Really, for nobles you should learn some manners.{***}
I think I will fight you, just because I don't like you.{***}
You dare trespass our holy forests? I think you deserve a lesson!{***}
We will see who teaches who a lesson!{***}
You dare trespass our holy forests? It is forbidden! Hurry and leave!{***}
We will do as we please, and you'll have to live with it.  Now, go away.{***}
Yes, I dare. And I will continue to do so as I please. Now, surrender or die!{***}
Fight me if you dare!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Time for slavers to become slaves.{***}
You dare fight me? Are you crazy, or just plain stupid?{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
We fight to protect and preserve the legacy of the Venetoran Empire, and its rightful heir, Atanos Octiem! Prepare to die, invaders!{***}
Your empire died long ago. May you join it in death!{***}
We fight for the Venetoran Empire, the rightful land of Atanos Octiem! Legionaries! Prepare for glory!{***}
Easy there! We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Your empire died long ago. Soon, you will die with it!{***}
Whoever dies this day, you will be among them!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Time for the assassins to be assassinated.{***}
Our Holy Order shall not stand infidels in our land. It is time for you to die.{***}
Your Holy Order is nothing but a collection of fools. You shall be the ones dying this day.{***}
Death is nothing to us, for we know that Mal'Kij watches over us. You, however, are the one I fear for. The depths of Hell shall consume you, infidel, for your insults.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Your Holy Order is nothing but a collection of fools. It's time for you to die.{***}
We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Death is nothing to us, for we know that Mal'Kij watches over us. You, however, are the one I fear for. The depths of Hell shall consume you, infidel, for your insults.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Your Holy Order is nothing but a collection of fools. It's time for you to die.{***}
We'll leave you in peace.{***}
Death is nothing to us, for we know that Mal'Kij watches over us. You, however, are the one I fear for. The depths of Hell shall consume you, infidel, for your insults.{***}
Bah. Heretic, you are barely worth our energy to fight. For Mal'Kiarj, glory, and victory!{***}
What a bunch of nonsense.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Prepare to die, infidels!{***}
Nah, we'll leave you in peace. Good day.{***}
Bah. Heretic, you are barely worth our energy to fight. For Mal'Kiarj, glory, and victory!{***}
What a bunch of nonsense.{***}
Prepare to die, infidels!{***}
Nah, we'll leave you in peace. Good day.{***}
Do you hear the howling? It is the sound of your destruction.{***}
All I hear is the blabbering of a pack of madmen.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
All I hear is the blabbering of a pack of madmen.{***}
It's no wonder you are mocked. You and your foolish order are all crazy.{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
We'll leave you in peace.{***}
We shall see who rules this desert!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Here's what I have to say to you...prepare for battle!{***}
You look delicious! I hope you attract men to come rescue you! Surrender and you will be rewarded the greatest pleasures!{***}
You're a bunch of mad women!{***}
I have something that may interest you.{***}
Death by snu snu!{***}
(They are yelling in a language you do not understand){***}
I don't even understand what you're saying!{***}
(Start yelling randomly){***}
Ei, você! Viu algum bandido por aqui?
Sim, um grupo deles foi por ali há cerca de uma hora.
Eu sabia! Vamos, rapazes, vamos pegar esses cães! Obrigado, {meu amigo/minha amiga}.
Não, não vi nenhum bandido ultimamente.
Bah! Eles se escondem como ratos neste país, mas vamos persegui-los e escorraçá-los algum dia. Mais cedo ou mais tarde...
I wish to collect on the bounties of some criminals I have captured.{***}
There's your bounty. Good work, rounding them up!  Farewell.{***}
Kiss my arse.{***}
How dare you! Prepare to die.{***}
Can you tell me more about the Border Patrol?{***}

We are men who have come from all over the country. We look for bandits and outlaws and we hunt them down as a cat hunts down a mouse. You must be new here, to not have heard of us. Don't go into any trouble, or we'll hunt you down too.{***}
Você não me dá medo. Lute comigo se tiver coragem!
Você não conseguirá nada de mim, exceto a lâmina da minha espada, seu verme!

{Milorde/Milady}, somos apenas pobres agricultores da aldeia de {s11}. {reg1?Estamos levando nossos produtos para o mercado de {s12}.:Estamos voltando do mercado de {s12} rumo à nossa aldeia.}.^^Ei, não é {o destemido/a destemida} {playername}? Gostaríamos de nos juntar a sua causa, você nos aceita?
Estou caçando um grupo de bandidos com a seguinte descrição... Você os viu?
We'll see how poor you are after I take what you've got!{***}
Please, sire! I don't know what we have done but please forgive us! We are simple farmers, I beg of you!{***}
Nah, I was just kidding. Stay safe!{***}
Thank you, sire! I promise we won't trouble you again!{***}
Too bad! Prepare to meet your makers!{***}
Verei o quanto vocês são pobres depois de tomar tudo o que têm!
Estou a seu serviço, {milorde/milady}.

column3: Está bem. Você ganhou. Que todos os presentes hoje vejam que você me venceu e eu abandonarei meu cortejo a {s10}. Está {satisfeito/satisfeita}, {bastardo/vadia}?

{s3}: Sim, {playername}? O que posso fazer por você?
Algo mais?
Quero rever a guarnição do castelo.
Mas é claro. Aqui estão nossas listas, deixe-me saber se você quiser fazer quaisquer mudanças...
Deixe-me ver seus equipamentos.
Naturalmente. Está tudo aqui...
Quero que abandone o castelo e una-se ao meu grupo.
Admito que gosto muito deste lugar... Mas se é esse o seu desejo, {playername}, irei com você.
E onde é que dormiremos? Você move um exército inteiro com você, {playername}, não há espaço suficiente para todos nós.
[Deixar]
Sim, {s0}?
Já chegamos em casa?
Ainda não.
Mal posso esperar. Sinto tanta falta da minha família que daria qualquer coisa para vê-los de novo.
{playername}, quando acha que chegaremos ao nosso destino?
Ainda temos um longo caminho pela frente.
Logo. Estamos quase lá.

Ah, nesse caso, vou desfrutar um pouco mais da viagem. Eu não vou reclamar. Acho muito mais agradável cavalgar ao ar livre do que ficar sentada no castelo o dia todo. Eu invejo você, sabia? Poderia viver assim o tempo todo.

Me alegro por isso. Não que eu não goste da sua companhia, mas sim porque sinto falta dos meus doces caprichos. Ainda assim, lamento ter que deixá-lo tão cedo. Você deve me prometer que, por vezes, virá me visitar.
Saudações, {playername}, meu mais importante {súdito/súdita}. Aguardo o seu conselho.
Algo mais?
O que acha de nossos progressos até o momento?

{reg11?Nós temos {reg11} lordes ao nosso lado:Ainda não temos nenhum lorde ao nosso lado}, enquanto que {reg21?{s9} ainda possui {reg21} lordes o apoiando:{s9} não conserva a lealdade de nenhum lorde}. {reg19?Controlamos {reg13?{reg13} cidades:} {reg14?{reg14} castelos:} {reg15?e {reg15} aldeias:}:Não controlamos nenhum território}, enquanto que {reg29?eles têm {reg23?{reg23} cidades:} {reg24?{reg24} castelos:} {reg25?e {reg25} aldeias:}:eles já não possuem nenhum território}. No total, {s30}.
Nesse caso, temos que continuar lutando e mobilizar mais aliados!
Parece que essa rebelião não vai a lugar nenhum. Devemos nos render.
{playername}, você não pode me abandonar agora. Está falando sério?
De fato estou. Temo que não posso mais apoiá-lo.
Foi uma piada. Eu lutarei por você até que sejamos vitoriosos.
Você está absolutamente certo disso? Nunca {o/a} perdoarei se abandonar minha causa neste momento de máxima necessidade.
Digo-lhe isso com plena convicção.
Pensarei mais sobre o assunto.
Que assim seja. Nesse caso, minha causa está perdida. Agora, só resta-me uma coisa a fazer. Deixarei Calradia para nunca mais voltar. Com a minha partida você pode tentar fazer as pazes com o {s4}.
{reg65?Milady:Milorde}, me permite examinar seus equipamentos?
Muito bem, está tudo aqui...
Se não se importa, poderia me falar sobre suas habilidades?
Bem, é claro.
Sugiro que decida conceder um feudo que ainda esteja sem senhor.
Que feudo tem em mente?
E a quem deveria concedê-lo?
Não importa.
Continuemos nossa jornada, {reg65?milady:senhor}.
Algo mais?
Algo mais?
Sim, {s5}?
Como marechal, quero que envie uma mensagem aos vassalos do reino.
Deixe-me ver seus equipamentos.
Muito bem, está tudo aqui...
O que pode me dizer sobre suas habilidades?
Tudo bem, deixe-me lhe contar...
As you are my chief minister, I wish to speak to about affairs of state.{***}
Não é seguro para você. Você deve voltar para nossa corte.
Tem certeza disso, {s0}?
Sim.
Não, eu prefiro ter você ao meu lado.
Precisamos nos separar por um tempo.
Muito bem, voltarei a gerenciar meus próprios negócios.
É mesmo? Bem, eu não ficarei aqui esperando. Vou para as cidades encontrar outro trabalho. É isto o que você quer?
Bem, na verdade queria dizer-lhe uma coisa.
Sim. É aqui que nos separamos.
Não, prefiro ter você ao meu lado.
Bem... Então eu seguirei meu caminho. Me procure caso precise de mim.
Gostaria de lhe fazer uma pergunta.
Do you have an idea about this dagger?{***}

Of course. Wandering Perisno long enough has you learning many things. I recognize the craftsmanship on this dagger. Speak with Gordga Hammerhead, the old weaponsmith in Dwallnor. He will know what to do.{***}
Não importa.
Certo. O que quer saber?
O que acha da forma de como vão as coisas nesta companhia?
Conte-me sua história novamente.
Suponho que sabe que eu aspiro ser {o rei/a rainha} desta terra, certo?
Você tem contatos que possam ser úteis em nosso favor?
Estaria interessado em adquirir um feudo?
CHEAT: buff this person!{***}
Então logo em seguida eu me juntei ao seu grupo.
Algo mais?
Hmm... Sim. Recebi esta informação.
Então você apoia minha causa?
Muito bem. Levarei isto em conta.

Eu gostaria, {s21}. Além disso, tenho uma proposta que poderia ajudá-lo a alcançar o trono. Porém recentemente você enviou {s22} em uma missão similar. Talvez seja melhor esperarmos um pouco para evitar chamar muita atenção sobre nossas intenções.
Muito bem. Faça isso.
Pensando melhor, fique comigo um pouco mais.
Então adeus, {s21}, embora em breve nos veremos novamente.

Naturalmente, poucas pessoas devem saber que isso é possível. Se você quiser obter informações, ou perguntar-me algo, não envie nenhum mensageiro. Venha a mim pessoalmente... mesmo que isso signifique passar pelos portões disfarçado.
Excelente ideia... Vá em frente.
Na verdade, é melhor ficar longe por enquanto.
Perfeito. Já deverei ter algo para reportá-lo dentro de cinco dias. Agora adeus, {s21}, nos vemos em breve.
{playername}, você o salvou! Serei sempre grato por ter resgatado meu {s11}. Por favor, aceite isso como uma compensação por seu ato nobre.
É sempre uma honra servi-lo, {s65}.
Hmm? Oh, it's you.{***}
What are you doing here?{***}
The Fountain Temple is my only home. This is where I am most at peace.{***}
The world is a bitter place. More bitter than me, perhaps.{***}
I await the day I die on the battlefield. Perhaps Zedecia will then choose me as her chosen one.{***}
Chosen one? What do you mean?{***}
Don't be foolish. Every God and Goddess has a chosen one, or a warrior they adore the most.{***}
Zedecia will one day embrace me in her bosom, just as she embraced my family.{***}
Perhaps our meeting was by fate, {playername}. I will see you again.{***}
Yes, farewell Krysanna.{***}
Oh, {playername}, pode ser que não conheça nossos costumes, mas esperava que alguém lhes houvesse dito... Por favor, fale primeiro com meu {s11}, {s4}.
What's new?{***}

A large army of mysterious outlanders is invading Perisno. They call themselves Zann.  I once met a man named Shi Jin who was trying to warn people about them, but nobody listened to him.  And now the Zann are crushing our forces,and Shi Jin is probably the only one who know how to stop them.{***}
What kind of nonsense is this?{***}
Then I should find him and talk to him.{***}
I know that you were trying to warn people about Zann invasion. Do you know how to stop them?{***}
I know that you were trying to warn people about Zann invasion. Do you know how to stop them?{***}
I know that you were trying to warn people about Zann invasion. Do you know how to stop them?{***}

Stopping Zann won't be easy but it can be done. First of all, you need to understand that Jin Empire, whence Zann came, consists not only of original Jin lands, but also Khergia steppe, Sine land and Shun-Ha Island.  The Emperor granted these lands to his vassals, but not all of them are truly loyal to him. Some of these traitors left with the Zann, but there are also a few cunning ones who pretend to serve the Emperor of Jin yet in fact support Zann from abroad.{***}

They are sending their armies to assist Zann invasion.These armies are The Horde of Jin, The Horde of Sine, The Horde of Shun Ha and The Horde of Khergia. If you defeat them, you will likely find the names of Jin lords who support Zann.  Give these names to me, and I will send them to my uncle. And then I can guarantee you that you will no longer see these armies in Perisno.{***}
I defeated The Horde of Jin. Here are some documents I found.{***}
I defeated The Horde of Jin. Here are some documents I found.{***}
I defeated The Horde of Jin. Here are some documents I found.{***}

Excellent! This is what I need. I will immediately send a messenger to the Emperor of Jin.{***}
Excellent! This is what I need. I will immediately send a messenger to the Emperor of Jin.{***}
Excellent! This is what I need. I will immediately send a messenger to the Emperor of Jin.{***}
I failed the quest.{***}
I found the person wearing strange black armor and did what was required.{***}

Good work.  I owe you a lot for helping me with this task.  That's your reward. But be careful. People over there are watching you.  And I don't think their intentions are good. Farewell, {playername}.{***}
Yes. I just happen to have a new client. He's a strange type though. I don't think I ever saw a black armor like the one he's wearing. Are you interested?{***}
No, thanks. Maybe next time.{***}
Yes. Where is this client now?{***}
He is waiting in {s8}.{***}
During my travels, I've learned some secrets of engineering. Also, Syabr is now in {s8}!{***}
Take this tamga. If you show it to the Fort captain, he will let you recruit some of our troops from time to time.{***}
Não sei onde encontrar meu {s11}, {s10}, que segundo as tradições é quem deve presidir nosso casamento. Talvez devamos esperar até que alguém o encontre.
Are you that person who was looking for help? I was sent here by the Guild.{***}
Yes. You see, my master ordered me to have a castle built for him with a pond in its yard. But there is a problem...{***}
Wait. I am an adventurer, not a civilian engineer. I don't know how to build castles.{***}

You don't need to. And if you had been patient enough to let me finish, you would have known that my master sent Syabr, a renowned  fortification builder, to do this job. My role in this is merely making sure he has all the resources he needs. But now all my efforts will be pointless, because  several days ago an escaped soldier from Syabr's escort arrived and said that they were ambushed by a large group of Mosoru riders. Syabr was taken prisoner by them  and now I need someone to rescue him.{***}
Don't you have troops for this? You don't look like a person who's experiencing a lack of soldiers at his disposal.{***}
I certainly do. But I am no commander, nor a warrior, and I don't have anyone who could lead my soldiers in battle. So are you  willing to take this job and rescue our engineer?{***}
No. It is too dangerous for me.{***}
I'd like to help you but I don't have enough troops for this ask.{***}
Yes, I am ready to help.{***}
That's alright. You are not the first coward who rejects this job after hearing the details.{***}

This is not an issue. Actually, I have just bought some slaves from Ramun to work on castle construction. They will soon be escorted  to our fort. Just follow them and when you arrive at the fort, find the captain and talk to him. Give him this letter, and he will give you some troops to help you on  the task, as well as a scout who will lead you to the Mosoru.{***}

Splendid. Then let us get to business. A group of slaves, that I have just bought Ramun to work on castle construction, will soon  be escorted to our fort. Follow them, and after you arrive at the fort, find the captain and talk to him. Give him this letter, and he will have a scout lead you to the  Mosoru.{***}
O honrado {s12} concordou em permitir que retornemos às nossas famílias. Começaremos a viagem o quanto antes.
Who are you? What do you want?{***}
I was sent here by Temnik Arslan. I need to get to Zann Outpost.{***}
I'd like to search your carts.{***}
Never mind!{***}
Follow us then. We are just heading there{***}
How dare you?! We are under protection of Emperor Zann Mandate of Heaven! Your foolish act will not be forgotten.{***}
I have come from Temnik Arslan (show the letter).{***}
I see. I will have several troops and one of our scouts join your party and help you.  Talk to the scout for the details on Mosuru's location{***}
A scout joined your party. Talk to him.{***}
Tell me what happened. Where was Syabr's party attacked?{***}
They were moving across the desert from a dwarven town of {s8} to our outpost. That's  when they were ambushed by the Mosoru.{***}
What were they doing in Kaikoth lands?{***}

Tower and bridge schematics for the future castle were designed by the famous Jin architect Gudu de lang.  However it turned out that stone in these lands is not firm enough to hold the whole structures.{***}
So Syabr headed to the dwarven master Totigor to buy some components that are necessary for creating a sturdier compound.{***}
All right. So where should we start looking for him?{***}
I suggest that we head to the desert, find and capture one of Mosoru riders and ask him what he knows about the ambush and Syabr's current whereabouts.{***}
Great. Then it's what we're going to do.{***}
You! What do you know about a recent attack on the caravan that was carrying a cargo of construction materials?{***}
What? I don't know nothing about it!{***}
I have no idea what you are babbling about.{***}
I've only heard that there was an attack on a caravan that turned out to be carrying some stone dust  instead of gold and valuables.{***}
I know that we suffered heavy losses yet only got a couple of prisoners and several bags of dust in the end.{***}
Fine. You are free to go.{***}
Where did you get the prisoners?{***}
As usual, we sold them into slavery to a tavern keeper in one of Hakkon towns.{***}
What town was it?{***}
Fine. You are free to go.{***}
So I've heard you were buying slaves...{***}

Yes. But not for myself. It's just when one of this town's citizens need a slave, they come to me.  Adventurers are also happy to get rid of prisoners they captured. Eventually it's a better option than dealing with those professional slave traders.{***}
Have you recently bought anyone who was wearing an unusual armor?{***}
And why should I answer this question?{***}
I need this information. If you want, I can do a favor for you in return.{***}
All right. I could use some help from a good soldier. You see, a group a Masnerian mercenaries had a fight in my tavern  a couple of days ago. They broke a lot of stuff but didn't pay for it.{***}
If somebody doesn't teach them a lesson, my other clients will also start to think they can do whatever they want in my tavern.{***}
Do you need them dead or alive? Or just their gold?{***}
I need them to pay. Whether they will end up dead or alive, does not really matter to me.{***}
Fine. I'll do it. So for whom did you buy the slaves that were wearing a strange armor?{***}
I think those Masnerian mercs were about to leave town soon. And it means that my money will leave with them.{***}
All right. You can consider them dead. I'll get back to you soon.{***}
Those troublesome mercenaries are dealt with.{***}
Those troublesome mercenaries are dealt with.{***}
That's good. Except I have heard that it wasn't you who defeated them. Anyway, where are my 10000 aurums?{***}
Great. Where are 1000 aurums that they owe me?{***}
Here is the money.{***}
You'll have them. I'll get back to you soon.{***}
Here is the money.{***}
You'll have them. I'll get back to you soon.{***}
Here is the money.{***}
All right. A deal is a deal. Go and talk to our Guild Master. It was him I bought those slaves of yours for.{***}
Who are you? What do you want?{***}
I'm here to make you pay your debt to the tavern keeper of {s8}.{***}
I've heard that you recently bought some slaves and several of them were wearing strange black armor. Is that true?{***}

Well, yes, I did buy several slaves. I needed them to work on reinforcing town walls.  And - yes, some of those slaves looked unusual, as if there were not from around here.  And I can even tell you more - one of those slaves turned out to be quite a brilliant engineer. Thanks to his advice on multiple matters, we could finish in a week what we would otherwise have spent a month working on.{***}
Why are working in reinforcing town walls? Shouldn't that be your lord's concern?{***}

Out town was granted Magdeburg rights by the Emperor a long time ago. For the most of the time, we are making decisions on our own: what to produce, with whom to trade and so on. Justice here also lies in the hand of the court, not the town lord.  Other than this, we paying taxes to the lord, while he is partially taking care of town's defenses.{***}
Interesting. Anyway, I'm here because I want to buy that bay those slave including the engineer you were talking about.{***}
Him? Hmm, I don't know if should even consider this. I haven't seen such a talent in a long time. But, well, if the price is right...  let's say 30000 aurums.{***}
Here is your gold!{***}
What? A fortune for a slave?{***}
Yes. But... well, you could also do something for me.{***}
Tell me what you need.{***}

As I was saying, our lord is only partially responsible for town's defenses. Hence, about a half of our garrison should be comprised of local recruits.  But most citizens have grown wealthy and like living their lives. They don't want to serve in the army.{***}
Fine, why won't you hire mercenaries then?{***}
This is just what I am about to do. People here collected 10000 aurums to sign a contract with the Freelancer Guild, to hire their troops for our garrison and patrols.{***}
What is this Freelancer Guild?{***}

It is a mercenary guild from the west coast of Tolrania. Their base is located near a river, to the west from Enduin castle.  Go there and ask freelancers to sign the contract. If you do it, the slaves will be yours. After all, I believe they will be done with the walls by the time you return.{***}
All right. I'll do this. Give me the money you collected.{***}
He-he. No. First you have freelancers sign the contract, and then we will talk about the money.{***}
I was sent here by the Guild Master of the town of {s8}. He wishes to sign a contract with your guild to hire freelancers for the town garrison as well as patrols.{***}
That can be arranged. Did you bring 10000 aurums?{***}
Here is the money.{***}
Not yet. But I'll get back to you soon.{***}
Here is 10000 aurums for the contract.{***}
I'm running short of money these days. Maybe a person like me can do something for you instead?{***}

Hmm. All right. A group of my freelancers deserted from an army that hired them having  killed several fellow soldiers in the process. That seriously damaged our reputation, so I need to teach them a lesson. As far as I know, the last time they were spotted near {s7}.  Deal with them, and the contract will be yours for only a half of the price.{***}
No, this task is too much for me. I'd rather bring you the money.{***}
I'll do it.{***}
Group a freelancer deserters have been eliminated by another party.{***}
This is also good. Did you bring 10000 aurums?{***}
Here is 5000 aurums for the contract.{***}
Those troublesome deserters are dealt with.{***}
This is good. Did you bring 5000 aurums?{***}
Here is the money.{***}
Not yet. But I'll get back to you soon.{***}
Here is 5000 aurums for the contract.{***}
So the contract is signed. The party of freelancers will soon head for {s8}.{***}
See you later!{***}
Who are you? What do you want?{***}
I'd like to search your carts.{***}
Nothing{***}
How dare you?! Your foolish act will not be forgotten.{***}
You are a threat to people of {s8}. Surrender or die!{***}
What? You want a fight, so be it!{***}
Who are you? What do you want?{***}
Nothing.{***}
Surrender or die!{***}
I signed the contract with freelancers. Now it's you turn. Give me the slaves and 10000 aurums you owe me.{***}
You probably misunderstood me. I'm giving you the slaves, as for money...  well, let's say it's a compensation for the fact that I'm letting them keep their equipment.{***}
Fine. Just let's get this over with.{***}
The engineer and his companions will be waiting for you at the town gate.{***}
Em breve partirei para {s5}. É bom saber que ainda há pessoas neste mundo com senso de honra.
Bem, {playername}... você teve um duelo com {s10} e perdeu. De acordo com nossos costumes e tradições, não posso voltar a recebê-lo. Adeus, {playername}.
Greetings!{***}
Greetings.  I will lead you to {s8}.{***}
Eh. We've made it this far... What do you want me to do?{***}
You follow my lead. I'll take you through a safe route.{***}
Alright. I'll be right behind you.{***}
You stay here for a while. I'll go ahead and check the road.{***}
Alright. I'll be waiting here for you.{***}
I found the client and did what was required.{***}
Good work.  That's your reward. But be careful. People over there are watching you.  And I don't think their intentions are good.{***}
Hello, {playername}. A lord came to our Guild recently, asking for help. Are you interested?{***}
Solving nobles' problems? I think I'll pass.{***}
Yes. Who is this lord?{***}
He is the owner of the town of {s8}.{***}
To continue the quest, improve your relations with the current factions of {s9}{***}
To continue the quest, improve your relations with {s9}.{***}
I'm here on behalf of Adventurer's Guild. What kind of help do you need?{***}

Oh, the problem is the citizens of {s8}, these ungrateful rebels.  They keep supporting that Nibor Hood cutthroat. Even a part of town's garrison is practically on his side now, and I have to do something about it.  My plan is to hire a team of loyal mercenaries to reinforce the garrison and watch for those traitors.{***}
I'm sorry, I'm not interested.{***}
All right, I can help you with this. What kind mercenaries do you want to hire? {***}
Outlanders. Those who do not share locals' beliefs and views. I think somebody like Nihonian mercenaries will do.  Find them and persuade them to work for me. {***}
One of local lords is looking for mercenaries to serve in his town's garrison. Are you interested?{***}
Well, we don't know anything about you, let alone this lord. But money could solve this problem.  Hire us, and then we can talk.{***}
You have your money. So what about garrison service I mentioned? {***}

This is a good offer, but there are too few of us here.  However, a large party of my friends along with their chieftain Omelian Kasap were hired to get  rid of a band of brigands robbing people near {s9}.  They are probably at the castle at this moment. Go and talk to them. {***}
Greetings, {s9}! My name is {playername}. I came with an offer for you and your men.{***}
Speak then. What is it? {***}
A lord who owns Vinica wants you to serve in the garrison of his town. Money will not be a problem, but you will need to watch for other soldiers and ensure  their loyalty to the lord. {***}

Hmm. This is a fine offer for an old man such as I. Speaking frankly, I've gotten  tired of traveling, and the garrison duty is what I probably need now.  In other words, I agree. I'll see you outside castle walls.{***}
Ah, {playername}. Como é bom vê-l{o/a} novamente. Contudo, acredito que necessitam de mim em outro lugar.
So, we are not far from {s8}. But it looks like there is a rebellion going in the town.{***}
What do we do now?{***}

I have a plan. First I and my people enter the town claiming that we came to join Nibor Hood. Then after the gates are open, it's your turn.  We will only be able to hold the gates for a short time, so hurry!{***}
Ok. I'll see you at the tavern after we deal with the rebels! Good luck!{***}
Follow me.  I will lead you to {s8}.{***}
Eh. We've made it this far... What do you want me to do?{***}
You follow my lead. I'll take you through a safe route.{***}
Alright. I'll be right behind you.{***}
You stay here for a while. I'll go ahead and check the road.{***}
Alright. I'll be waiting here for you.{***}
The old woman is now in Fountain Hall!{***}
Did she pay you for that? Because she didn't left any gold for The Guild.{***}
What?! She only gave me a couple of coins! I thought that The Guild would pay me the rest... Gods! That old woman...{***}

Ha ... ha ... ha ... Oh, that's been a long time since a laughed so hard! (clears throat) Well, I'm sorry, but we have no money to give you. The woman left her armor though. You can take it if you need it.{***}
Do you want to make some aurums?{***}
Then you have to talk to the elderly woman near town. She looks for help.{***}
Sorry. I can't do that right now.{***}
Ali! Posso ver os muros de {s3} à distância! Chegamos sãos e salvos. Tome estes {reg3} denares, como prometi. Espero que possamos viajar novamente juntos em uma outra oportunidade.
Saia daqui antes que eu perca a paciência, patife.
Greetings. You must be my escort, right?{***}
What? ... Yes, I suppose so. My name is {playername}. I was told you were looking for help.{***}
That is true. My name is Oksanamunmun. You need to know what you are about to sign up for, so let me tell you my story.{***}

I used to have a daughter who was unfortunate to give birth to a boy.  The Amazon Priestesses ordered her to sacrifice him to the gods so that they will help us in our fights against Tolranian lords...{***}
That's barbaric!{***}
... My daughter escaped and left the child with me. When she returned, she was executed.  This made me change my mind about life. I ran away and took my grandson with me.{***}
And now you are planning to begin a new life?{***}
Yes. I want to go to the town of free people where residents do not pay attention to one's sex or origins.{***}
Is there such town in Perisno?{***}

There is! It is called Fountain Hall. But I have a problem. The Priestess' cadres are now hunting us.  I took refuge in this city. Now I am looking for someone to escort me to my destination. Are you up to this task?{***}
I am! I will lead you to Fountain Hall.{***}
Eh. We've made it this far... What do you want me to do?{***}
You follow my lead. I'll take you through a safe route.{***}
Alright. I'll be right behind you.{***}
You stay here for a while. I'll go ahead and check the road.{***}
Alright. I'll be waiting here for you.{***}
Hey, you! Don't move! Surrender the old traitor to us, and then we will let you go!{***}
No! (clears throat)... And you should rather get married! Maybe then you will stop being so afraid of men!{***}
(Angrily) Get me the traitor! Alive!{***}
Hold on, ladies! Where are your manners? It's no good to attack people without even saying Hello!{***}
Get me this piece of shit too! The Priestess will cut out {reg33?her:his} tongue!{***}
Where did the old hag and her grandson hide?{***}
Gods, you are stubborn! Stay away from me!{***}
What's new?{***}
The elderly amazon is looking for you. I saw her at the tavern of {s8}.{***}
I don't want to see this liar.{***}
Thank you for telling me! I'll talk to her.{***}
Greetings, {playername}. I couldn't pay you for your help back then but I can now.{***}
Thanks!{***}

I managed to do quite well in this town. I'm not short of money anymore, my grandson is safe, but my daughter ... My heart is longing for revenge. I saved some gold and hired a couple of mercenaries, but I cannot leave my grandchild. He needs nurture and protection. So now I am looking for someone who would avenge my daughter's death for me.{***}
No, not interested{***}
Well, those ladies don't like me anyway. Do you know where they are to be found?{***}
No, but captain Berkut is trying to find the murderer of my daughter. From time to time he visits the tavern of Lille. Can you find him there and talk to him?{***}
Você chegou a tempo. Unimos nossas forças e demos uma lição nos nossos inimigos!
Greetings, {s9}! My name is {playername}. I was sent here to help you. You and your soldiers have been placed at my disposal.{***}
Yes, {reg33?madame:sir}!{***}
How is your investigation doing?{***}
I sent my men to gather information, and they found out that the Naphali of this town are supporting the Ankars.{***}
From time to time they would send a caravan of goods guarded by female soldiers. I believe such caravans go to Ankars.{***}
In my opinion you should start by finding out what exactly those caravans carry.{***}
Good work, captain! When does the next caravan leave the  town?{***}
Very soon.{***}
Good. I'll deal with the caravan, and you stay here and gather your men.{***}
Who are you? What do you want?{***}
I'd like to search your carts.{***}
How dare you?! We are under protection of Queen Arwen! Your foolish act will not be forgotten.{***}
{reg33?Madame:Sir}{***}
Stay here and gather your men.{***}
Unfortunately, I couldn't search the caravan.{***}
Está cometendo um grande erro ao lutar contra nós.
Mais uma vez você salvou nossos pescoços, {playername}! Realmente é {o/a} melhor {dos amigos/das amigas}. {s43}.
Unfortunately, I couldn't search the caravan.{***}
That is bad. However, another caravan left the town about an hour ago. You can try and catch this one.{***}
Caravan guards refused to show me their goods voluntarily, so I had to search the caravan by force. It was carrying bows and arrows.{***}
Good work.{***}
So, what do we do now?{***}
I think I have to tell Oksanamun about that. You and your men should stay here.{***}
Yes, {reg33?madame:sir}. But be careful. People over there are watching you. And I don't think their intentions are good.{***}
Greetings, {playername}. What news do you bring?{***}
I intercepted a caravan that departed from the town of Lille. It was carrying amazon bows and arrows.{***}

Good! Amazons do not produce weapons on their own. Instead they maintain good relationship with the Naphali. The Naphali deliver supplies. Amazons pay with gold or slaves, protect trade routes and do other things in return.{***}
Now you have to keep looking in this direction.{***}
Find amazons who are waiting for caravans from Lille. Talk to captain Berkut about that.{***}

After you defeat them, let someone live and tell them to tell the others that it was my revenge. Tell them that I will not stop until their priestesses come to me. I am sure that the queen will not risk jeopardizing trade with the Naphali and therefore will fulfill my demand.{***}
Fine. I'll do as you say.{***}
Be careful.{***}

Good work. Thank you!{***}
Você chegou na hora certa, {playername}. Não esquecerei sua ajuda. {s43}
Greetings, Oksanamun!{***}
Thank you, {playername}! If you ever need my help, do not hesitate to ask.{***}
Hi, {playername}!{***}
Hi, {playername}!{***}

All right{***}

I found Joan Zwiebel's army, defeated and killed her!{***}
Good work.  I owe you a lot for helping me with this task. Farewell, {playername}.{***}
It is great to see you, {playername}. I have a problem. Some time ago, a mysterious stranger came to me. He gave The Guild a dangerous assignments which I was foolish  enough to accept.{***}
Back then I did not quite realize how difficult it would be to fulfill it. So now I am asking for you help. Are you up  to a challenge?{***}
No, thanks.{***}
Sure, I always am!{***}
Great! It's about getting rid of someone... a woman.{***}
How is this difficult? You could just hire a couple of Ral'Daiun assassins.{***}
They already made five attempts but haven't been successful. The name of the woman is Joan Zwiebel.{***}
Well, I suppose the assassins just couldn't stand against her beauty (smiling).{***}
It's not about that. Joan Zwiebel was leading militia during the War of the Woods. Now she is very popular.  A lot of people support her, even more than they would support their own king.{***}
Really?!{***}
Yes. And I am actually inclined to believe that this 'Mysterious Stranger' was the Tolranian Spymaster.{***}
So this is all about politics. And now I either have to cooperate and kill that woman or die because of knowing  too much.{***}
Yes, I suppose these are your choices. Good luck.{***}
So this is all about politics. And now I either have to cooperate and kill that woman or die because of knowing  too much.{***}

Who are you? What do you want?{***}

The log of orders is in Meadbrewer. You can ask him.{***}
Where's Meadbrewer?{***}

Hi! Do you have customers?{***}

Good work.  That's your reward. But be careful. People over there are watching you.  And I don't think their intentions are good.{***}
I found the client and did what was required.{***}
Good work.  That's your reward. But be careful. People over there are watching you.  And I don't think their intentions are good.{***}
Hi! Can you help me make a couple of aurums?{***}
Hi! I forgot. Where is the client?{***}

You have  unusual drinks?{***}
Such a pity. A barrel of mead with kalyna berries emptied.{***}
Kalyna? What it is?{***}

Mead with kalyna. Shucks!{***}
John is my cousin. You can find it in the armorer workshop in this town.{***}
Silver Hawk said that you have a good mead with kalyna berries.{***}

(You drank a sip of mead).{***}
